level.heading: Nominally unsatisfactory bearing material.
level.text: ยง 27-677 Nominally unsatisfactory bearing material. Fill material, peat, (group Pt), organic silts and clays (grouping OL and OH), soft or loose soils of groups ML, CL, HM and CH, varved silt, or satisfactory bearing materials that contain lenses of, or are underlain by, these materials shall be considered as nominally unsatisfactory bearing materials.
